message: If you have created a startup, or are planning to, what are some of the challenges you *have* encountered so far, and how did you tackle them?
Of course, always have a UI Designer & Graphic Designer in your startup. And feed them well (especially the former. Keep UI Designers super happy).
The best kind of "gamble" is the small kind of gambles. Smaller gambles are the money making kind.

Do your patent research well. If you have the funds, it might be a good idea to hire a patent lawyer to help you research existing patents, and how to patent your own work. I learned this the hard way.
build a great team, it helps startup to face their  problem

Be persistent in your way, stop talking and do action. the things that's been tackling around is environment, including the peoples. if we can't observe enough, we're just as fragile as business folks out there
@evanhindra Is it posible to patent our startup, especialy in Indonesia, how to do that?
